languages.text: "Не отбираем, а контролируем и распределяем". {n}Блюститель угрюмо бубнит:{/n} "Чернь горазда врать и воровать. Дано распоряжение следить и обращать внимание на лиц, имеющих при себе талоны сверх положенной нормы. Во избежание растраты припасов и голода".

"We appropriate nothing. We just monitor and redistribute," {n}the enforcer mutters gloomily.{/n} "The rabble are a lying and thieving lot. We have instructions to stay alert for people holding more than the standard amount of ration cards. To prevent supply embezzlement and famine."
languages.original_text: "Не отбираем, а контролируем и распределяем". {n}Блюститель угрюмо бубнит:{/n} "Чернь горазда врать и воровать. Дано распоряжение следить и обращать внимание на лиц, имеющих при себе талоны сверх положенной нормы. Во избежание растраты припасов и голода".

traits.locale_text: "We appropriate nothing. We only monitor and redistribute." {n}The enforcer mutters gloomily,{/n} "The rabble are a lying and thieving lot. We have instructions to stay alert for people who possess ration cards in excess of the normal quantity. In order to prevent supply embezzlement and famine."

"We appropriate nothing. We only monitor and redistribute." {n}The enforcer mutters gloomily,{/n} "The rabble are a lying and thieving lot. We have instructions to stay alert for people who possess ration cards in excess of the normal quantity. In order to prevent supply embezzlement and famine."

"We appropriate nothing. We just monitor and redistribute," {n}the enforcer mutters gloomily.{/n} "The rabble are a lying and thieving lot. We have instructions to stay alert for people holding more than the standard amount of ration cards. To prevent supply embezzlement and famine."

"We appropriate nothing. We just monitor and redistribute," {n}the enforcer mutters gloomily.{/n} "The rabble are a lying and thieving lot. We have instructions to stay alert for people holding more than the standard amount of ration cards. To prevent supply embezzlement and famine."

"We appropriate nothing. We just monitor and redistribute," {n}the enforcer mutters gloomily.{/n} "The rabble are a lying and thieving lot. We have instructions to stay alert for people holding more than the standard amount of ration cards. To prevent supply embezzlement and famine."

"We appropriate nothing. We just monitor and redistribute," {n}the enforcer mutters gloomily.{/n} "The rabble are a lying and thieving lot. We have instructions to stay alert for people holding more than the standard amount of ration cards. To prevent supply embezzlement and famine."

languages.text: «No nos apropiamos de nada. Solo vigilamos y redistribuimos». {n}El guardia murmura, sombrío.{/n} «La turba está llena de mentirosos y ladrones. Tenemos instrucciones de prestar atención a la gente que tenga más tarjetas de racionamiento de las habituales. Para evitar la malversación de suministros y las hambrunas».
languages.original_text: "We appropriate nothing. We just monitor and redistribute," {n}the enforcer mutters gloomily.{/n} "The rabble are a lying and thieving lot. We have instructions to stay alert for people holding more than the standard amount of ration cards. To prevent supply embezzlement and famine."

traits.locale_text: «No nos apropiamos de nada. Solo vigilamos y redistribuimos». {n}El guardia murmura, sombrío.{/n} «La turba está llena de mentirosos y ladrones. Tenemos instrucciones de prestar atención a la gente que tenga más tarjetas de racionamiento de las habituales. Para evitar la malversación de suministros y las hambrunas».

languages.text: 「我々は何も横領していない。我らはただ監視して、再分配しているだけだ」{n}エンフォーサーが恨めし気につぶやく。{/n}「連中は嘘つきで泥棒です。我々は配給カードを規定量以上持っている人間に注意するよう指示しています。物資の横領と食糧不足を防ぐために」
languages.original_text: "We appropriate nothing. We just monitor and redistribute," {n}the enforcer mutters gloomily.{/n} "The rabble are a lying and thieving lot. We have instructions to stay alert for people holding more than the standard amount of ration cards. To prevent supply embezzlement and famine."

traits.locale_text: 「我々は何も横領していない。我らはただ監視して、再分配しているだけだ」{n}エンフォーサーが恨めし気につぶやく。{/n}「連中は嘘つきで泥棒です。我々は配給カードを規定量以上持っている人間に注意するよう指示しています。物資の横領と食糧不足を防ぐために」

languages.text: “我们什么都没有克扣过。我们只是负责监察他们，重新分配他们的配给。”{n}执法者沮丧地喃喃自语着。{/n}“这群暴民都是骗子、小偷。我们收到了指示，说要对配给卡超出标准数量的人格外留意，以免发生补给挪用的事故，爆发饥荒。”
languages.original_text: "We appropriate nothing. We just monitor and redistribute," {n}the enforcer mutters gloomily.{/n} "The rabble are a lying and thieving lot. We have instructions to stay alert for people holding more than the standard amount of ration cards. To prevent supply embezzlement and famine."

traits.locale_text: “我们什么都没有克扣过。我们只是负责监察他们，重新分配他们的配给。”{n}执法者沮丧地喃喃自语着。{/n}“这群暴民都是骗子、小偷。我们收到了指示，说要对配给卡超出标准数量的人格外留意，以免发生补给挪用的事故，爆发饥荒。”

languages.text: "Wir nehmen gar nichts ab. Wir beobachten nur und verteilen um", {n}murmelt der Enforcer düster.{/n} "Der Pöbel lügt und stiehlt. Wir haben Anweisung, auf alle zu achten, die mehr Essensmarken haben als üblich. Um Unterschlagung von Vorräten und Hungersnöte zu vermeiden."
languages.original_text: "We appropriate nothing. We just monitor and redistribute," {n}the enforcer mutters gloomily.{/n} "The rabble are a lying and thieving lot. We have instructions to stay alert for people holding more than the standard amount of ration cards. To prevent supply embezzlement and famine."

traits.locale_text: "Wir nehmen gar nichts ab. Wir beobachten nur und verteilen um", {n}murmelt der Enforcer düster.{/n} "Der Pöbel lügt und stiehlt. Wir haben Anweisung, auf alle zu achten, die mehr Essensmarken haben als üblich. Um Unterschlagung von Vorräten und Hungersnöte zu vermeiden."

languages.text: « Nous ne nous approprions rien du tout. Nous ne faisons que surveiller et redistribuer au besoin, {n}marmonne sombrement le prévôt.{/n} Ces gens ne sont que des menteurs et des voleurs. Nous avons reçu pour instruction d'être particulièrement attentifs à ceux qui possèdent plus de tickets de rationnement qu'ils ne devraient. Pour éviter tout détournement des ravitaillements, qui risquerait de provoquer une famine. »
languages.original_text: "We appropriate nothing. We just monitor and redistribute," {n}the enforcer mutters gloomily.{/n} "The rabble are a lying and thieving lot. We have instructions to stay alert for people holding more than the standard amount of ration cards. To prevent supply embezzlement and famine."

traits.locale_text: « Nous ne nous approprions rien du tout. Nous ne faisons que surveiller et redistribuer au besoin, {n}marmonne sombrement le prévôt.{/n} Ces gens ne sont que des menteurs et des voleurs. Nous avons reçu pour instruction d'être particulièrement attentifs à ceux qui possèdent plus de tickets de rationnement qu'ils ne devraient. Pour éviter tout détournement des ravitaillements, qui risquerait de provoquer une famine. »

languages.text: "Biz, hiçbir şeye el koymayız. Yalnızca denetleyip yeniden dağıtırız." {n}İnfazcı, kasvetle mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Ayaktakımı, yalancı ve hırsız tiplerden ibaret. Kaynakların zimmete geçirilmesini ve kıtlığı önlemek için standart kumanya kartı miktarından fazlasını elinde tutanlara karşı gözümüzü açık tutma talimatı aldık."
languages.original_text: "We appropriate nothing. We just monitor and redistribute," {n}the enforcer mutters gloomily.{/n} "The rabble are a lying and thieving lot. We have instructions to stay alert for people holding more than the standard amount of ration cards. To prevent supply embezzlement and famine."
